fields.summary: Preserve compatibility of ClientProtocol#rollingUpgrade after finalization

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: When a hdfs rolling upgrade is started and a rollback image is created/uploaded, the active NN does not update its {{rollingUpgradeInfo}} until it receives a query command via RPC. This results in inconsistent info being showing up in the web UI and its jmx page.
fields.summary: Rolling upgrade readiness is not updated in jmx until query command is issued.

comments.body: In {{FSNamesystem#getRollingUpgradeStatus()}}, we can have it update the rollback image state like {{queryRollingUpgrade()}} does.
[~kihwal] Thanks for reporting this issue... Attached the patch, kindly review..
Thanks a lot for your pointers,,Addressed your comments..:)
